Package com.mohamed.capstonebankdemo.controllers

package com.mohamed.capstonebankdemo.controllers
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.mohamed.capstonebankdemo
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AccountController
    This is the controller for all account based activity
    AppController
    This is the controller for the dashboard as well as the menu navigation at the top of the page once logged in
    AuthController
    This is the Authentication controller for when a user is logging in or logging out
    IndexController
    This is the index controller for the main page and the errors that could occur
    RegisterController
    This is the controller to control the registration page of the application
    TransactionController
    This is the controller for the different transactions a user can do
